mapper.select:
SELECT DI.DVC_ID , DI.MNG_ID , MAX(DC.DVC_COND) AS DVC_COND , V.VHC_ID , V.VHC_NO , V.CHAS_NO , CP.CORP_NM AS CORP_NM , V.AREA , V.MAKER , V.RELS_DATE , V.MODEL_NM , DL1.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_KIND , DL2.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_TYPE , DL3.DL_CD_NM AS LF_YN , DL4.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_FUEL , V.REMARK , V.USE_YN , MAX(CHAR_LENGTH(DL0.DL_CD_NM)) AS DL_CD_NM FROM BM_DVC_INFO DI LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_COND DC ON DI.MNG_ID = DC.MNG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_VHC_INFO V ON DI.VHC_ID = V.VHC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL0 ON DVC_COND = DL0.DL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL1 ON V.VHC_KIND = DL1.DL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL2 ON V.VHC_TYPE = DL2.DL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL3 ON V.LF_YN = DL3.DL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL4 ON V.VHC_FUEL = DL4.DL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_CORP_INFO CP ON V.CORP_ID = CP.CORP_ID
V.VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR V.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
GROUP BY VHC_ID

SELECT DI.DVC_ID , DL0.DL_CD_NM AS DVC_KIND , DL1.DL_CD_NM AS MAKER , DL2.DL_CD_NM AS DVC_TYPE , DL3.DL_CD_NM AS INST_LOC , DL4.DL_CD_NM AS DVC_COND , DI.MNG_ID , DI.DVC_IP , DI.REMARK , V.VHC_ID , DL3.TXT_VAL1 , DL3.TXT_VAL2 FROM BM_DVC_INFO DI LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_COND DC ON DI.MNG_ID = DC.MNG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_VHC_INFO V ON DI.VHC_ID = V.VHC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL0 ON DI.DVC_KIND = DL0.DL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL1 ON DI.MAKER = DL1.DL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL2 ON DI.DVC_TYPE = DL2.DL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL3 ON DI.INST_LOC = DL3.DL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL4 ON DC.DVC_COND = DL4.DL_CD WHERE DI.VHC_ID = #{value}
